Philippines' Marcos congratulates Lai for election as Taiwan presidentPhilippines President Ferdinand Marcos Jr on Monday congratulated Taiwan's new president-elect Lai Ching-te on his election victory. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 12:40:35 GMT KLJGAOM75VJXNOHMPRU4RUXRJI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-marcos-congratulates-lai-election-taiwan-president-2024-01-15/Reuters世界亚太地区
Reformist Arevalo assumes Guatemalan presidency after opposition delaysAnti-corruption crusader Bernardo Arevalo took office as Guatemala's president early on Monday after a chaotic inauguration caused by a last-minute attempt by opposition lawmakers to weaken his authority. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 12:35:42 GMT M5SZZ4LVN5NRRIJGCKJK5N5XCY https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/reformist-arevalo-assumes-guatemalan-presidency-after-opposition-delays-2024-01-15/Reuters世界美洲
Iran: US can't call for restraint while backing Israel's war in GazaThe United States cannot call for restraint while supporting Israel's war in Gaza, Iran's foreign minister said on Monday, while calling for a diplomatic solution to the war in the enclave. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 12:22:06 GMT 4BZMSBGIJVJEZCVDIAVXBUHYLY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-us-cant-call-restraint-while-backing-israels-war-gaza-2024-01-15/Reuters世界中东
Explainer: Houthi attacks expose China's commercial stakes in Red SeaChina has called for an end to attacks on civilian vessels in the Red Sea that have dramatically widened the Hamas-Israel conflict and placed Beijing's commercial interests along the Suez Canal at risk. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 12:20:06 GMT MTOXQYUA7ZNDHHT54APNCZ7NXU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/houthi-attacks-expose-chinas-commercial-stakes-red-sea-2024-01-15/Joe Cash世界中东
North Korean hackers, criminals share money laundering networks in Southeast Asia - UNNorth Korean hackers are sharing money-laundering and underground banking networks with fraudsters and drug traffickers in Southeast Asia, according to a United Nations report published on Monday, with casinos and crypto exchanges emerging as key venues for organised crime. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 12:00:29 GMT TRJB6XWRUVLWXBNFW5OB5JUABY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korean-hackers-criminals-share-money-laundering-networks-southeast-asia-un-2024-01-15/Tom Wilson世界亚太地区
Qatar pauses Red Sea tankers after Western strikes on HouthisQatar's state energy company has paused sending tankers through the Red Sea after US-led strikes against Houthi militants in Yemen targeting the crucial trade route. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 11:53:18 GMT SYPZJ6YM2BLCTKDY3C3NAQQ55M https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/qatar-pauses-red-sea-tankers-after-western-strikes-houthis-2024-01-15/Andrew Mills, Maha Dahan世界中东
Turkish strikes hit water, power infrastructure in Syria’s Kurdish-held northeastTurkey has carried out a wave of air strikes on electricity and oil infrastructure in Syria's Kurdish-held northeast that has put several power stations out of service, local sources and Syrian state media said on Monday. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 11:43:57 GMT UVH5M6AOFFJIBNRLBJO5BB43ZM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkish-strikes-hit-water-power-infrastruct-syrias-kurdish-held-northeast-2024-01-15/Reuters世界中东
No snow: Tourists cancel holidays as Indian ski resorts run dryA lack of snowfall has led to empty ski resorts and holiday cancellations in the Indian Himalayas, with scientists linking the "unusual" winter to the El Nino weather phenomenon. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 11:20:11 GMT PCFVD7CGSROGTPATJS4KPMQS64 https://www.reuters.com/world/india/no-snow-tourists-cancel-holidays-indian-ski-resorts-run-dry-2024-01-15/Fayaz Bukhari, Shivam Patel世界印度
US Deputy Treasury Secretary to discuss use of new Russia sanctions authority in trip to Europe, JapanU.S. Treasury Deputy Secretary Wally Adeyemo will travel to Europe and Japan this month, where he will coordinate with partners on the use of a new Russia sanctions authority that takes aim at financial institutions, a Treasury spokesperson told Reuters. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 11:19:27 GMT JO4BLF32XJNZTMUIYGDFWRHBTE https://www.reuters.com/world/us-deputy-treasury-secretary-discuss-use-new-Russia-sanctions-authority-trip-2024-01-15/Daphne Psaledakis世界
Denmark's new King Frederik X appears before parliamentDenmark's newly proclaimed King Frederik X appeared before the country's lawmakers on Monday, receiving the full support from the country's prime minister whose party has grappled with how to relate to the monarchy. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 11:17:50 GMT U525C344IBINRJWPCGQYSLYKBM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/denmarks-new-king-frederik-x-appears-before-parliament-2024-01-15/Jacob Gronholt-Pedersen, Stine Jacobsen世界欧洲
Party of Pakistan's Ex-PM Nawaz Sharif launches election campaignThe party of Pakistan's former prime minister Nawaz Sharif, considered the front-runner to win upcoming general elections, launched its campaign on Monday amid accusations that the military's support is already giving him an edge over rivals. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 11:14:39 GMT PB2AXSKVZZLXXGC3DU53WA7YJE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/party-pakistans-ex-pm-nawaz-sharif-launches-election-campaign-2024-01-15/Asif Shahzad世界亚太地区
